item.title: DeepSeek 助推人工智能热 为中国人大注入新活力
item.description: 几年来，中国一年一度的国家立法机构会议越来越有条不紊，其低沉的气氛实际上是对国内经济停滞日益加深的担忧的回应。【原文：For some years now, China’s annual gathering of its national legislature has been an increasingly disciplined and choreographed affair — its muted vibes practically an echo of deepening concern about domestic stagnation.】

item.title: 安全初创企业 Chainguard 募集 35 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，风险投资公司 Kleiner Perkins 正在洽谈牵头为网络安全初创公司 Chainguard Inc. 融资 3.5 亿美元，将其估值提高到 35 亿美元。【原文：Venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins is in talks to lead a funding round of $350 million for cybersecurity startup Chainguard Inc., according to people familiar with the matter, lifting its valuation to $3.5 billion.】

item.title: 最后期限临近，澳大利亚力推特朗普关税豁免政策
item.description: 尽管堪培拉和华盛顿的官员们在最后一刻进行了讨论，但澳大利亚仍在淡化美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）预计将在几天内对钢铁和铝关税实行豁免的可能性。【原文：Australia is playing down the possibility of an exemption from steel and aluminum tariffs expected from US President Donald Trump within days, despite last-minute discussions between officials in Canberra and Washington.】

item.title: 股市下跌拖累加密货币，比特币和以太币下滑
item.description: 由于对美国股市下挫的担忧盖过了唐纳德-特朗普总统最近为支持该行业所做的努力，加密货币进一步下滑。【原文：Cryptocurrencies slid further as fears over a selloff in US equities eclipsed President Donald Trump’s recent efforts to buttress the industry.】

item.title: 小肯尼迪被农场和食品集团逼迫使用 "合理 "科学
item.description: 代表食品和农业部门的约 300 个团体敦促特朗普政府在寻求改善美国公民健康状况时使用 "可靠、高质量的科学"。【原文：Around 300 groups representing the food and agriculture sectors urged the Trump administration to use “sound, quality science” when seeking to improve the health of American citizens.】

item.title: 花旗下调美股评级，上调中国股市评级，因美国例外论暂停
item.description: 花旗集团的策略师将美国股市的评级从增持下调至中性，同时将中国股市的评级上调至增持，称美国的例外论至少已经暂停。【原文：Citigroup Inc. strategists downgraded US equities to neutral from overweight while upgrading China to overweight, saying that US exceptionalism is at least on pause.】

item.title: 美国经济放缓担忧引发避险买盘，国债延续涨势
item.description: 由于对世界最大经济体经济放缓的担忧刺激了对避险资产的需求，国债与亚洲和欧洲同类货币一起扩大了涨幅。【原文：Treasuries extended gains along with their Asian and European peers as concern over a slowdown in the world’s largest economy spurred demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 估值下跌刹住印度绿色 IPO 热潮
item.description: 随着绿色股票估值骤降，印度创纪录的清洁能源首次公开募股热潮已经褪去。【原文：India’s record boom in clean energy IPOs has faded as valuations for green stocks plunge.】

item.title: TA Associates 考虑出售在印度 OmniActive Health 公司的股份
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，TA Associates 正在考虑出售其在 OmniActive Health Technologies Ltd. 公司的大部分股份。【原文：TA Associates is considering selling its majority stake in OmniActive Health Technologies Ltd., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 市场大跌后投资者审时度势，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 由于投资者对美国经济放缓的担忧点燃了股市和大多数商品的广泛回调，黄金在小幅下跌后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied after a modest decline as investor concern about a US slowdown ignited a broad retreat in stocks and most commodities.】

item.title: 中国人民银行在美国例外论质疑声中开始减少对人民币的支持
item.description: 对美国例外论的怀疑给了中国一个急需的喘息机会，因为人民币的强势使其可以通过每日参考汇率回调支持。【原文：Doubts over US exceptionalism are giving China a much needed break from strongly defending its currency, as the yuan’s strength allows it to dial back support via its daily reference rate.】

item.title: 力拓出售债券为收购钒锂提供资金
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）表示，该公司正寻求在美国出售债券，以帮助偿还用于为其 67 亿美元收购 Arcadium Lithium Plc 公司提供资金的过渡性贷款。【原文：Rio Tinto Group said it’s seeking to sell bonds in the US to help repay a bridging loan used to finance its $6.7 billion acquisition of Arcadium Lithium Plc.】

item.title: 阿根廷总统米莱伊签署行政令支持国际货币基金组织计划
item.description: 据《民族报》（La Nacion）和《信使报》（Clarin）报道，阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）周一签署了一项紧急行政令，授权与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）达成一项新协议。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei signed an emergency executive decree on Monday to mandate a new deal with the International Monetary Fund, news outlets La Nacion and Clarin reported, signaling that a staff-level agreement is closer than ever.】

item.title: 日本武藤再次呼吁豁免特朗普关税
item.description: 日本贸易大臣在与美国贸易部长的首次当面讨论中，加倍强调了将日本排除在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税运动之外的要求。【原文：Japan’s trade minister doubled down on a request for Japan to be excluded from President Donald Trump’s tariff campaign in his first in-person discussions with his US counterparts.】

item.title: 日本央行会议前下调日本经济增速
item.description: 日本经济在 2024 年最后一个季度的扩张速度低于初步数据报告的速度，这一结果可能会促使日本央行在下周举行会议时保持政策设置的稳定。【原文：Japan’s economy expanded in the last quarter of 2024 at a slower pace than reported in preliminary data, a result that may give the Bank of Japan added incentive to hold policy settings steady when authorities gather next week.】

item.title: 英国购物者减少消费，向里夫斯发出警告信号
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将发布重要的最新报告，在此之前，两项调查显示，英国购物者在二月份减少了开支，这可能表明英国经济依然疲软。【原文：British shoppers reined in their spending in February, according to two surveys that could point to lingering weakness in the economy ahead of a crucial update from Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves.】

item.title: 中国铝业公司在原材料大幅下跌中大获全胜
item.description: 由于主要原材料氧化铝的成本大幅下降，世界最大的铝生产国中国的铝冶炼厂今年的利润将大幅反弹。【原文：Aluminum smelters in China, the world’s biggest producer, are set to enjoy a sharp rebound in profits this year as the cost of their key raw material, alumina, plunges.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者信心因通胀降温和降息而跃升
item.description: 随着通胀压力的缓解以及储备银行四年来首次降低利率，澳大利亚消费者信心在三月份有所回升。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence picked up in March as inflation pressures eased and the Reserve Bank reduced interest rates for the first time in four years.】

item.title: 原油创六个月新低，石油公司首席执行官支持特朗普的能源议程
item.description: 本周一，一些世界顶级石油和天然气生产商的高管们全力支持唐纳德-特朗普总统的 "能源主导 "政策，尽管金融市场因对其经济议程的广泛担忧而下滑。【原文：Executives from some of the world’s top oil and gas producers offered full-throated support for President Donald Trump’s “Energy Dominance” on Monday, even as financial markets slumped on broader concerns about his economic agenda.】

item.title: 市场避险情绪升温，石油跌势扩大
item.description: 在股市和其他风险资产大跌的影响下，石油连续第二天下跌。【原文：Oil fell a second day, tracking a plunge across wider equity markets and other risk assets.】

item.title: 库什塔德公司将继续推进七项专利申请；i 协议有望获得美国批准
item.description: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.将继续 "友好而坚持不懈地 "尝试达成收购 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. will keep up “friendly and persistent” attempts to forge a deal to acquire Seven & i Holdings Co., saying that it has the financing in place and sees a clear path to gaining antitrust regulatory appeal in the US.】

item.title: TXNM 在获得收购意向后探讨出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TXNM 能源公司在收到一家潜在收购方的收购意向后，正在探讨出售事宜。【原文：TXNM Energy Inc. is exploring a sale after receiving takeover interest from a potential suitor, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 信贷交易员被华尔街的白刃战惊醒
item.description: 席卷股票和其他风险资产的恐慌情绪正慢慢渗入企业信贷市场，引发了新的担忧，即过去两年反弹的债务可能会出现修正。【原文：The fear sweeping through stocks and other risk assets is slowly bleeding across corporate credit markets, raising new worries that debt that has rallied for the last two years could be due for a correction.】

item.title: 聚能公司首席执行官因董事会关系紧张而辞职
item.description: 保利诺有限公司（PolyNovo Ltd.据媒体报道，董事会与高级管理层之间的关系紧张，引发了动荡，公司首席执行官斯瓦米-拉奥特（Swami Raote）辞职，辞职立即生效。【原文：PolyNovo Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Swami Raote resigned, effective immediately, after turmoil sparked by media reports of tension between the board and senior management.】

item.title: 监管机构发出警告后，日本经纪商重新考虑重新包装的日本国债
item.description: 在日本金融监管机构宣布对价值 670 亿美元的所谓结构性贷款市场进行全面取缔后，日本最大的经纪商开始重新考虑向地区性贷款机构出售结构性贷款。【原文：Japan’s biggest brokers are having second thoughts about selling so-called structured loans to regional lenders after the nation’s financial regulator declared a sweeping clampdown on the $67 billion market.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省大力拓展石油直销业务
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省政府正在推进允许油砂生产商以沥青支付特许权使用费的计划，让他们转手出售这些油砂桶，从而大大扩大政府在市场中的作用。【原文：Alberta’s government is moving ahead with plans to allow oil sands producers to pay their royalties in bitumen, letting it turn around and sell those barrels in a major expansion of the government’s role in the market.】

item.title: 贡渥集团着眼于提升美国天然气生产资产
item.description: 贡渥集团主席托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjörn Törnqvist）表示，贡渥集团正在寻求购买更多资产，在最近几年经济繁荣所带来的丰厚收益的基础上再接再厉。【原文：Gunvor Group Chairman Torbjörn Törnqvist said the trading house is looking to buy more assets, building on a flurry of deals it has made by deploying bumper earnings from recent boom years.】

item.title: 美国股市下跌后，亚洲股市有望下滑：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市有望追随美国股市的跌势，纳斯达克100指数（Nasdaq 100）在这一天创下了自2022年以来的最差表现，因为人们越来越担心关税和政府裁员将破坏世界最大经济体的增长。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to track US losses that dragged the Nasdaq 100 to its worst day since 2022, as anxiety mounts that tariffs and government firings will torpedo growth in the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 能源组织敦促七国集团减少对俄罗斯天然气的依赖
item.description: 能源行业团体呼吁七国集团政府摆脱俄罗斯天然气，考虑液化天然气在全球能源安全中的作用。【原文：Energy industry groups are calling on the G7 governments to diversify away from Russian gas and consider the role of liquefied natural gas as global energy security.】

item.title: 股市暴跌，市场投机边缘遭到抨击
item.description: 美国股市出现的避险情绪让去年的大赢家科技巨头们感到痛苦，但与投机性更强的边缘市场相比，这种情绪就显得微不足道了。【原文：The flight from risk taking place in US equities has been painful for the tech giants who were last year’s big winners, but it pales in comparison to the walloping being doled out in the more speculative fringes of the market.】
